item.title: Namespaced Taxonomy Syndrome
item.description: The Discovery of a Syndrome The past week I had some really nice holidays, but my wife still had to work. That’s nice sometimes because it means staying at home with loads of time to do one of my favorite things: getting myself into learning and coding (I also did some cleaning, cooking and DIYing too!). I was surfing YouTube for good coding talks and one caught my attention. It was Jack Diederich’s PyCon 2012 talk entitled “Stop Writing Classes”.
